net.engio.mbassy.bus.config

Interface IBusConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusConfiguration

    public interface IBusConfiguration
    The configuration of message bus instances is feature driven, e.g. configuration parameters are grouped into Feature. Features can be added to a bus configuration to be used later in the instantiation process of the message bus. Each bus will look for the features it requires and configure them according to the provided configuration. If a required feature is not found the bus will publish a ConfigurationError to the ConfigurationErrorHandler
    Author:
    bennidi.
